General.Name: Shenzhen Bingchuan Network Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Bingchuan Network Co.,Ltd. operates as an online gaming company in China. It develops games, such as Longwu and Expedition mobile games, Guigu and Shadow Warriors, expedition, Long Wu, and Undefeated legend. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

4.Name: Mr. Guojun  Zhang
4.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
